thread.title: Marketing Specialist - Round Rock Area - Sports Management
thread.title_full: Marketing Specialist - Round Rock Area - Sports Management

title: Marketing Specialist - Round Rock Area - Sports Management
text: Assist in the development and leading of the execution of the annual marketing plan through activities such as: Strategy and budget planning sessions with the Regional Marketing Director   Since your site launched in 2000, WorkInSports.com has been the go to place for USA Baseball when we are looking to fill full-time openings and internships. Your reputation throughout the sports industry as a vital tool for job seekers and employers is well deserved. Thanks again! David Perkins
